backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing branding updates to show "Vikash Sports" across the app and listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files including components, styles, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, theme variables, and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root element and page title "Vikash Sports".
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling cart state, product navigation, hero section, and page layout including header and footer.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetails.t: Displays detailed product information with image, price, description, add‑to‑cart action, and a not‑found fallback.
frontend/src/components/ProductList.tsx: Renders a responsive grid of product cards with view‑details and add‑to‑cart actions.
frontend/src/components/SportsShopHeader: Header showing the site title "Vikash Sports" and a cart count indicator with an icon.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines a Product interface and exports a seeded list of five sports products.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context and hooks, handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a comprehensive set of CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, radius, shadows, animations, and loads plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, feature definitions, and requirements for a Sports Shop web app.
